Description: Pottery, Soba Ware, painted decoration types on large basins. Marked with old decoration type numbers. Includes decoration types between 1000 and 1493.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
Acquisition name: Donated by: British Institute in Eastern Africa
Division of Finds: National Corporation for Antiquities and Museums (NCAM)
